content: this is the pattern for a frog appliqué **i do have this pattern available for free on my website if you would prefer that option the link is down below but i ve made it available for people to download as well for $1 on ravelry ** there is also a video tutorial for the pattern available on my youtube channel at crochet frog tutorial 1 i ve used 8 ply cotton and a 2 5mm crochet hook but you can use different sizes depending on what you re most comfortable with * i used green white and black 8 ply wool which is light worsted in the us and double knit in the uk * a crochet hook i used a 2 5mm hook * scissors * a sewing needle and thread to stitch the frog together * darning needle to weave in ends * a small amount of embroidery or sewing cotton to embroider on a mouth 1 https //youtu be/dcwixpge9js
